remarks: The identity component, the connected component containing the identity element, is a closed ( ~ concompcld ) normal subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tgpconcomp.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgpconcomp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
tgpconcomp.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
tgpconcomp.s $e |- S = U. { x e. ~P X | ( .0. e. x /\ ( J |`t x ) e. Con ) } $.
tgpconcomp $p |- ( G e. TopGrp -> S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d G x $.
$d J x $.
$d X x $.
